name: Anlong Ming
content: Anlong Ming @ BUPT Home Teaching Anlong Ming（明安龙）Professor, Doctoral Supervisor, Ph.D,  Dept. of Computer Science, BUPTOfficial Homepage: https://teacher.bupt.edu.cn/mal/               Email: mal@bupt.edu.cnMailing Address:806#, Bldg. Scientific Research, Beijing University of Posts and telecommunications, 10 Xitucheng Rd, Haidian District，Beijing, 100876, ChinaResearch InterestsComputational Aesthetics, Computational Photography, Embodied AI.Research LabvRobotIT: Laboratory of Visual Robots & Intelligent TechnologiesPublicaitionsSelected PublicationsBrief BiographyDegrees            - Ph.D., Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, at Beijing, China            - M.S., Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, at Beijing, China            - B.S., Wuhan University, at Wuhan, ChinaAppointments            - 2016 Professor, Beijing Univ. of Posts & Telecomm., Dept. of Computer Science            - 2012 Associate Professor, Beijing Univ. of Posts & Telecomm., Institute of Sensing Technology and Business            - 2011 Post-doc, University of California at Los Angeles, Dept. of Statistics            - 2011 Associate Professor, Beijing Univ. of Posts & Telecomm., Dept. of Computer Science            - 2008 Assistant Professor, Beijing Univ. of Posts & Telecomm., Dept. of Computer ScienceMajor Professional Service            - Reviewer for NSFC (National Natural Science Foundation of China)             - Reviewer for IEEE Transactions on Image Processing            - Reviewer for IEEE Transactions on Multimeda            - Reviewer for IEEE Transactions on Industrial Infomatics
